data.comment: The match has started at Bramall Lane.
The match has started at Bramall Lane.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Sheffield push upfield and Oliver McBurnie gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Norwich defence.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Attention is being given to Norwich’s Max Aarons and play has been suspended briefly.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Norwich.
Teemu Pukki (Norwich) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Max Aarons is back on his feet again.
Norwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Norwich are whistled for offside.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Norwich in their own half.
Can Norwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
At Bramall Lane, Sheffield are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Simon Hooper awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Norwich.
Throw-in for Norwich in their own half.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Norwich in their own half.
Throw-in Norwich.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Norwich territory.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Norwich.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Jack O`Connell (Sheffield) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for Sheffield, close to Norwich's area.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Norwich needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Billy Sharp heads Sheffield into a 1-0 lead.
John Lundstram instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Sheffield.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In Sheffield Sheffield attack through John Lundstram. The finish is off target, however.
Simon Hooper awards Norwich a goal kick.
In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Simon Hooper signals a Sheffield throw-in in Norwich's half.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Sheffield's John Lundstram is on target but unsuccessful.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at Bramall Lane.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norwich's half?
Josip Drmic is replacing Todd Cantwell for the away team.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Norwich territory.
Free kick for Norwich in their own half.
Throw-in for Norwich in the half of Sheffield.
Norwich surge into the attack at Bramall Lane but Josip Drmic’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Norwich have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Corner awarded to Norwich.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
Norwich drive forward but Josip Drmic is judged offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Enda Stevens is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Simon Hooper signals a Sheffield throw-in in Norwich's half.
Simon Hooper signals a Norwich throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Enda Stevens (Sheffield) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Ben Osborn.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Chris Basham for Sheffield gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Throw-in for Norwich at Bramall Lane.
Simon Hooper awards Norwich a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Alexander Tettey with Mario Vrancic. This is the second substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
Simon Hooper awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Norwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Norwich's half?
Throw-in for Norwich in their own half.
David McGoldrick is on a sub for Billy Sharp for Sheffield.
Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
Norwich to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Norwich have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Norwich have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Simon Hooper awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Norwich in their own half.
Free kick for Norwich in their own half.
Norwich are caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Norwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jamal Lewis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Norwich.
Throw-in for Norwich close to the penalty box.
Can Norwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Throw-in for Norwich in the half of Sheffield.
Norwich make their third substitution with Adam Idah replacing Ondrej Duda.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Norwich in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Oliver McBurnie.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Norwich.
Throw-in Sheffield.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Norwich goal kick.
Norwich's Emiliano Buendia breaks free at Bramall Lane. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
It seems as if Oliver McBurnie is unable to continue. Sander Berge replaces him for the home team.
